lore: The Nature Magi, alarmed by the progressive deterioration of the forests, decided to animate the strongest trees to preserve the ecosystem. They raised their roots, shook their branches and finally were able to walk on the deteriorated land that needed their protection.\n\nAshwood Ents are rarely aggressive, and often walk through the forest looking for injured animals to help them.
menagerieDialog: There is nothing quite like the clean air of a Rodian forest.
I'll make short work of anyone who dares desecrate nature.
This castle smells like a wasteland. I would prefer to leave this place at once.
I feel invigorated in your presence. Thank you for looking after me.
(A little bird is nesting in this creature's branches which is oddly endearing.)
name: Ashwood Ent
